Name: Brake Tag
Ingredients: 45 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Heavy on the Southern Comfort and amaretto with fruit juice.
History: Discovered in 2005 at Café Adelaide's Swizzle Stick Bar, New Orleans, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Brake Tag contains 198 calories
